name: D. Jzzhu and Cities
statement:
Jzzhu is the president of country A. There are cities numbered from to
in his country. City is the capital of A. Also there are roads
connecting the cities. One can go from city to (and vise versa) using
the -th road, the length of this road is . Finally, there are train
routes in the country. One can use the -th train route to go from
capital of the country to city (and vise versa), the length of this
route is .Jzzhu doesn’t want to waste the money of the country, so he is
going to close some of the train routes. Please tell Jzzhu the maximum
number of the train routes which can be closed under the following
condition: the length of the shortest path from every city to the
capital mustn’t change.
